title: Devils Postpile National Monument: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Stairs to Base of Rainbow Falls Closed for Repairs  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Stairs to Base of Rainbow Falls Closed for Repairs  The trail to the base of Rainbow Falls is closed so park crews can complete trail maintenance and mitigate rockfall hazards. The closure is expected to last throughout the season. Visitors still have access to the two viewpoints overlooking the waterfall. more     Information        Devils Postpile Campground Will Not Open Until 2017  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Devils Postpile Campground Will Not Open Until 2017  Due to a necessary waterline replacement and an emergency infrastructure repair of the wastewater system, the monumentâ€™s 20 site campground will not open until the 2017 summer season. more
